text: Peter Brown (9 October 1906 – 1 January 1988) was an Australian rules footballer who played for North Melbourne in the Victorian Football League (VFL) in 1928. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1906 births Category:1988 deaths Category:North Melbourne Football Club players Category:Dimboola Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Peter Brown (Australian footballer, born 1906)
